function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"CO2 concentration as a sole indicator for airborne infection risk","Impact":"Misleading risk assessment and ineffective infection control","Mitigation":"Include additional indicators and parameters in infection risk assessment","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, particulate matter sensors","People":"Occupants, building managers, public health authorities","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of air flushing in reducing particle concentrations","Impact":"Inability to reduce airborne pathogen levels","Mitigation":"Implement constant high percentage of outdoor air supply, use air filtration and purification systems","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV lamps, outdoor air supply systems","People":"Occupants, building managers, public health authorities","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Difficulty in controlling ventilation rate for natural ventilation","Impact":"Inconsistent removal of pathogens in the air","Mitigation":"Optimize room layout, implement cross-ventilation strategies, utilize air quality sensors","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, room layout optimization tools, ventilation design software","People":"Building managers, architects, public health authorities","Owner":"Architects, building managers, public health authorities"}]}
